mapper.select: SELECT * FROM vw_searchpage_accommodation WHERE accommodation_name ILIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR accommodation_address ILIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT a.accommodation_id, a.accommodation_name, a.accommodation_address, a.accommodation_latitude, a.accommodation_longitude, c.category_code, -- 최저가 계산 (객실 테이블 조인) (SELECT MIN(p.product_price) FROM product p WHERE p.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id) AS min_price, -- 평점 평균 (리뷰 테이블 조인) COALESCE((SELECT AVG(r.rating) FROM review r WHERE r.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id), 0) AS avg_rating, -- 리뷰 개수 (SELECT COUNT(r.review_id) FROM review r WHERE r.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id) AS review_count FROM accommodation a LEFT JOIN category c ON a.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN accommodation_facility f ON a.accommodation_id = f.accommodation_id
AND (a.accommodation_name ILIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR a.accommodation_address ILIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
AND a.accommodation_latitude IS NOT NULL AND a.accommodation_longitude IS NOT NULL
AND ( 6371 * acos( cos(radians(#{latitude})) * cos(radians(a.accommodation_latitude::DOUBLE PRECISION)) * cos(radians(a.accommodation_longitude::DOUBLE PRECISION) - radians(#{longitude})) + sin(radians(#{latitude})) * sin(radians(a.accommodation_latitude::DOUBLE PRECISION)) ) ) <= 5
AND (SELECT MIN(p.product_price) FROM product p WHERE p.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id) >= #{minPrice}
AND (SELECT MIN(p.product_price) FROM product p WHERE p.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id) <= #{maxPrice}
AND c.category_code IN
#{type}
AND f.${facility} = true
AND a.accommodation_address ILIKE '%' || #{accommodationAddress} || '%'
ORDER BY min_price ASC NULLS LAST LIMIT 12
ORDER BY a.accommodation_id DESC
SELECT * FROM vw_searchpage_accommodation WHERE accommodation_address ILIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY min_price LIMIT 12

SELECT * FROM vw_searchpage_accommodation WHERE ( 6371 * acos( cos(radians(#{accommodationLatitude})) * cos(radians(accommodation_latitude)) * cos(radians(accommodation_longitude) - radians(#{accommodationLongitude})) + sin(radians(#{accommodationLatitude})) * sin(radians(accommodation_latitude)) ) ) <= 5
